sentences.en: Mr Bush is a convert to an evangelical Christianity that emphasises emotion—particularly the intensely emotional experience of being born again—over ratiocination.
sentences.cn: 布什皈依基督教福音派，该派强调主观情绪，尤其是狂热的再生体验，要凌驾于推理之上。

sentences.en: Reasonable ratiocination is a important method gaining mathematical discovery, author introduces concept of the ratiocination, function and way. Quoted example is fascinating and valuable.
sentences.cn: 合情推理是数学发现的重要方法，本文介绍了合情推理的概念、作用、途径。所论及的内容对数学教学有参考价值。

sentences.en: Your thesis is short for the accurate ratiocination to suppose your argument.
sentences.cn: 你的论文缺少能证明你的论点的正确推理。

words.tran_cn: 推论；推理；采用三段论法
